Title: Relates to requiring businesses to meet certain green requirements to be eligible for the START-UP NY program
Summary: Relates to requiring businesses to meet certain green requirements to be eligible for the START-UP NY program; businesses operating in newly constructed buildings shall be powered by at least thirty-five percent alternative energy; businesses operating in already existing buildings shall utilize at least forty-five percent less electricity than neighboring businesses of similar size and business type.
LawCode: Amd ยง433, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to requiring businesses to meet certain green requirements to be eligible for the START-UP NY program
